EmailTemplate.name: Tyler Campaign 1 Voicemail Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Tackling diabetes, one step at a time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
I tried to get in touch with you over the phone but didn't catch you at the right time, so I left you a brief voicemail!
As an HR & Benefits professional, my guess is you've discovered what a problem diabetes is for {!Account.Name} and your employees.
At Livongo Health, it's our mission to empower people living with diabetes to better manage their condition - and help companies like yours save money in the process. We have a program in place that leverages a patented technology with a very targeted coaching & outreach component. Livongo is showing clinical results for the employees, and savings of over of $1,000 per person with diabetes per year.
I don't want to bombard you with attachments of our case studies right off the bat, but here is a link to some of our member and client testimonials that exhibit the power of Livongo:
http://www.livongo.com/impact.html
If you're interested, I'd be happy to send you over some of our case studies that show the impact that Livongo can have on cost savings.
I'd love to give you an overview of our program. What does your calendar look like in the next 10 days or so?
Thanks,
Tyler Vandenberg Sales Development Representative at Livongo Livongo o: 312.357.5540 e: tvandenberg@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave., Chicago, IL 60611 www.livongo.com
